title: Ex-Best
overview: What happens when your best friend isn't your best friend anymore?Ex-Best is a comedy about two women having to forge their individual identities after their friend "break-up" leaves them adrift in the adult world. With thirteen 4-minute episodes, Ex-Best uses the short form to tell a series narrative that shines a different light on female friendship.It's funny, awkward, and a little sad. Ex-Best is a show about the friend you thought you had
